testsuite.title: WFS 1.0 Conformance Test Suite
testsuite.description: Verifies that a Web Feature Service (WFS) implementation conforms to the relevant specifications: OpenGIS Web Feature Server Implementation Specification, Version 1.1.0 [OGC 04-094] The test run arguments are summarized in the following table. The obligation descriptor can have the following values: M (mandatory), O (optional), or C (conditional).

testrunargument.name: capabilities-url
testrunargument.description: An absolute URI that refers to an XML representation of the service capabilities document. This document does not need to be obtained from the service under test (SUT), but it must describe the implementation under test (IUT). Ampersand ('&') characters appearing within a query parameter value must be percent-encoded as %26.

testrunargument.name: complexvalue
testrunargument.description: Enable tests with complex property values.
